entry.data:
SUNNY, COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 15
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 4 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 4 BELOW

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 1 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
LOWS AROUND ZERO

PARTLY SUNNY
COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 15
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND ZERO

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 20
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND ZERO

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
